item.description:
Please take a moment to read the ENTIRE update, as I have updated the new meetup dates/locations.
MEETUPS AT 1:00PM



Please note our next SUNDAY meetup will be held at Doggie Day @ 1PM as well as the BOSTON COMMON @ 11:00AM!

The summer is finally season is here!!!Time to get those pups out and about! We will begin our indoor/outdoor season this month. I ask all members to please list which location you plan to attend in the comments section of your RSVP. This will help ensure that there's a "group" at each location. We don't want any lonely chihuahuas roaming about. For those who are new to the group, all members can choose to attend one or both meetups (Boston common , meets near Boylston T stop on the green @ 11AM) and/or Doggie Day play center at our usual time of 1:00pm.

A very special thanks to Kim and all others who take great photos for our website every meetup, check back often as your pet may be featured!



Indoor meetup will be held at Doggie day (1-3pm)


Should anyone have any questions, feel free to contact me.
Susana
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua October Meetup
